thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale
thread.title: Farm Near Woodstock & Major Highways

title: Farm Near Woodstock & Major Highways
text: Questions Business Summary 88 acres hobby farm minutes from Woodstock close to hwy 401 and hwy 403 west of Toronto. 65 acres are workable. Easy ramp access to the house. 2+5 bdrms 2 baths lower level with walkout, 3,000 sf of living space. Drilled well and septic, gas fireplace, laminate and carpet floors. Central air and central vacuum. Lift in garage into the house. A creek is running at the back of property. Toyota manufacturing plant is close by. Great development potential with close proximity to 2 major highways 401 and 403 ... Property taxes are $5k. Asking price $2.3 mln negotiable ALSO FOR SALE: 1.4 acres building lot with sandy beach and rocks within 18,000 acres provincial park 295' on North Channel of Lake Huron world class sailing on mainland but can be accessed by water or air only due to the fact that it is surrounded by 18,000 acres of provincial park which is not open to public and therefore there are no roads or trails backing into quartz covered mountains hunting is allowed in the park according to MNR ... it's for sale ... make me an offer Andrew Sobczak On Georgian Bay Real Estate Inc. Real Estate Brokerage RR2, Box 174, Victoria Harbour, ON, L0K 2A0 cell # 705 543 1341
